summary: Po and the Furious Five uncover the legend of three of kung fu's greatest heroes: Master Thundering Rhino, Master Storming Ox, and Master Croc.
cast: Jack Black|Angelina Jolie|Dustin Hoffman|Seth Rogen|Randall Duk Kim|Dennis Haysbert|Paul Scheer|Tony Leondis|Sumalee Montano|Paul Vogt|Todd Berger|Donald Fullilove|David Cowgill|Joseph Izzo|Edie Mirman|Michelle Ruff
keywords: kung fu|anthropomorphic animal|ancient china|voice over|kung fu fighting
title: Kung Fu Panda: Los secretos de los maestros
